languages.text: "Как-то мне довелось очутиться на арене, и там я... выживал как мог, чем очень развлек зрителей. Одна из ведьм, Тазарра заметила меня, нашла и сказала, что если я буду служить им своими мозгами и харизмой, то мне не придется служить им кровью и кишками".

"I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma, or with my blood and guts."
languages.original_text: "Как-то мне довелось очутиться на арене, и там я... выживал как мог, чем очень развлек зрителей. Одна из ведьм, Тазарра заметила меня, нашла и сказала, что если я буду служить им своими мозгами и харизмой, то мне не придется служить им кровью и кишками".

traits.locale_text: "I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma or my blood and guts."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “那个时候，我碰巧发现自己在竞技场里……为了生存，我做了我能做的一切，这让观众们相当开心。于是巫灵教派的塔扎菈注意到了我。她找到我，说我可以做个选择，要么用我的头脑与魅力为他们服务，要么用鲜血与内脏为他们服务。”
languages.original_text: "I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma, or with my blood and guts."

traits.locale_text: “那个时候，我碰巧发现自己在竞技场里……为了生存，我做了我能做的一切，这让观众们相当开心。于是巫灵教派的塔扎菈注意到了我。她找到我，说我可以做个选择，要么用我的头脑与魅力为他们服务，要么用鲜血与内脏为他们服务。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「私もアリーナに放り込まれた身でね…生き延びるためにありとあらゆる手を尽くしたのですが、それが観客に気に入られたようです。ウィッチのひとり、タザーラの目に留まりました。彼女は私を見つけ出し、私の頭脳とカリスマで彼女たちに尽くすか、血と内臓で奉仕するか、どちらか選べと言われました」
languages.original_text: "I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma, or with my blood and guts."

traits.locale_text: 「私もアリーナに放り込まれた身でね…生き延びるためにありとあらゆる手を尽くしたのですが、それが観客に気に入られたようです。ウィッチのひとり、タザーラの目に留まりました。彼女は私を見つけ出し、私の頭脳とカリスマで彼女たちに尽くすか、血と内臓で奉仕するか、どちらか選べと言われました」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «Acabé en la arena y... hice lo que pude para sobrevivir, lo que entretuvo bastante a la audiencia. Una de las brujas, Tazarra, se fijó en mí. Me encontró y dijo que podía servirles con mi mente y mi carisma o con mi sangre y mis entrañas».
languages.original_text: "I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma, or with my blood and guts."

traits.locale_text: «Acabé en la arena y... hice lo que pude para sobrevivir, lo que entretuvo bastante a la audiencia. Una de las brujas, Tazarra, se fijó en mí. Me encontró y dijo que podía servirles con mi mente y mi carisma o con mi sangre y mis entrañas».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma, or with my blood and guts."

languages.text: « Eh bien, quand je me suis retrouvé dans l'arène, j'ai... fait tout ce que j'ai pu pour survivre, ce qui a apparemment beaucoup diverti les spectateurs. Ce faisant, j'ai attiré l'attention de Tazarra, l'une des Cérastes, qui est venue me trouver pour me faire une proposition : j'avais le choix entre mettre mon intelligence et mon charisme à leur service, ou finir en pâtée pour xénos. »
languages.original_text: "I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma, or with my blood and guts."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, quand je me suis retrouvé dans l'arène, j'ai... fait tout ce que j'ai pu pour survivre, ce qui a apparemment beaucoup diverti les spectateurs. Ce faisant, j'ai attiré l'attention de Tazarra, l'une des Cérastes, qui est venue me trouver pour me faire une proposition : j'avais le choix entre mettre mon intelligence et mon charisme à leur service, ou finir en pâtée pour xénos. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Ich fand mich zufällig in der Arena wieder und ... tat alles, um zu überleben, was dem Publikum wohl gefallen hat. Eine der Hekatarii, Tazarra, bemerkte mich. Sie kam zu mir und sagte, ich könne ihnen entweder mit meinem Verstand und Charisma oder mit meinem Blut dienen."
languages.original_text: "I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma, or with my blood and guts."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fand mich zufällig in der Arena wieder und ... tat alles, um zu überleben, was dem Publikum wohl gefallen hat. Eine der Hekatarii, Tazarra, bemerkte mich. Sie kam zu mir und sagte, ich könne ihnen entweder mit meinem Verstand und Charisma oder mit meinem Blut dienen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Kendimi bir şekilde arenada buldum ve... Hayatta kalmak için ne yapmam gerekiyorsa yaptım, bu da izleyicileri bayağı bir eğlendirdi. Viçlerden Tazarra'nın dikkatini çektim. Beni buldu, ona beynimle ve karizmamla yahut kanımla ve iç organlarımla hizmet edebileceğimi söyledi."
languages.original_text: "I happened to find myself in the arena, and... I did whatever I could to survive, which entertained the audience quite a bit. One of the Wyches, Tazarra, took notice of me. She found me and said that I could serve them either with my brains and charisma, or with my blood and guts."

traits.locale_text: "Kendimi bir şekilde arenada buldum ve... Hayatta kalmak için ne yapmam gerekiyorsa yaptım, bu da izleyicileri bayağı bir eğlendirdi. Viçlerden birinin, Tazarra'nın dikkatini çektim. Beni buldu ve ona beynimle ve karizmamla veyahut da kanımla ve iç organlarımla hizmet edebileceğimi söyledi."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
